name: Uyên Uyên
wishText: Wish you always cheerful and happy! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.

outroText: OK. And finally I just want to say 'I LOVE YOU'
replayText: Do you agree to be my girlfriend ??? :3
